# Test

- `tidyverse`: This includes all the library...
- `nycflights13`: This includes flights data...

```{r, include = TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
flights |>
    filter(origin == "JFK" & carrier %in% c('UA', 'DL', 'AA')) |>
    ggplot(aes(x = carrier, fill = dest)) +
    geom_bar() +
    labs(
        title = "American Airlines, Delta, and United Airlines flights from JFK by destination"
    )
```
